title: Interpretation of a dream about a slave in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a slave in a dream is one of the very strange dreams that a person sees and wants to know its meaning and the most important clues, so today let us learn about the interpretation of seeing socks in a dream and what it means. Interpretation of a dream about slaves in a dream When you see someone running in a dream, this is a sign of goodness and blessing that he will receive. On the person. If a man thinks that he has met a maid in a dream, this is a warning sign of what he is doing and should leave her. To dream of a girl running in a dream, with white skin, is a sign of the income and livelihood that she will receive. If one sees that he has bought a yellow maid, then this A sign of his impending illness and the financial difficulties he will face. Seeing someone buying a black maid is a sign of relief from worries and sorrows. Seeing a current sale in a dream is a sign of the need for a home and the extreme poverty in which you live. Whoever sees that he is talking to a maid, this is a sign On the high position that he will reach soon. If a girl sees that she is a neighbor and introduces herself to people, this is evidence of her temptation in life and the conflict that she may fall into. When she sees the current unknown, this is a sign of good news that will reach you soon. Seeing a neighbor suffocating me in a dream is a sign of the emotional problems that she is dealing with. A girl’s dream that a maid bumps into her in a dream is a sign of countless adventures - A slave in a dream is a sign of facilitating the work that a person is doing. If a beautiful maid drowns in a dream, this is a sign of good news that will happen soon. Dreaming of a quarrel with a maid: Seeing someone arguing with a maid is a sign of openness in his work. Seeing a quarrel with a maid is a sign of the large sum that she will receive. If a woman sees that she is arguing with her maid, this is a sign that his life and circumstances will improve. A dream of fighting with a maid is a sign On the happiness and joys that a person will have. If a maid wins in a dream, this is a sign of good news for the girl and her upcoming marriage. A maid wearing my clothes Dream Interpretation If one sees that there is a maid wearing her clothes in a dream, this is evidence of one’s religiosity and closeness to God. When you see a maid wearing my clothes Clothes in a dream, this is a sign of good circumstances. Dreaming of a maid wearing my clothes in a dream indicates that the person is close to God Almighty. A maid wearing my clothes in a dream is a sign of a person’s high status. A married woman seeing a maid wearing her clothes is an indication of marital happiness in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a maid hitting a child: Seeing a child hitting a servant in a dream is a sign that good news will happen soon. title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a green dress

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a green dress: It is one of the most requested interpretations by various dreamers, due to the color green being distinguished from other colors by its joy and its association with the colors of green and trees. Interpretation of a dream about a green dress: Green is considered one of the calm colors that gives the dreamer a lot of comfort and confidence, which in turn is reflected in the vision of the green dress. In a dream, many things in her life are for the better. While the young man who sees in his dream that he is standing in front of him wearing a long green dress, this symbolizes his good morals and many good characteristics that make him a beloved and kind person in society who forces everyone to respect and respect. I appreciate.Interpretation of a dream about a green dress by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that seeing a green dress in a dream has many positive and distinct connotations, most of which are positive and blessed in the life of the one who sees it during his sleep, and this becomes clear as follows: If a girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a green dress, this symbolizes She is a girl who will come to life, as she is psychologically and emotionally balanced and wants to spread joy and fun to those around her because of her goodness. Her heart. However, if a woman sees that she is wearing a light green dress that shows her charm underneath, then what she saw indicates that she will be exposed to a big and very serious scandal, so she must deal with the matter as wisely as possible and try to do so. Avoid many things that will offend her. Interpretation of a dream Asrar is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. The green dress in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Al-Osaimi explained the green dress in the girl’s dream about her engagement to her. A devout, devout young man who loves her, cares for her, and continues his life with her in their beautiful home, which they build on good morals and values. He pointed out that the woman who sees in her dream that she is wearing a very long, green dress symbolizes the purity of her heart, the goodness of her heart, and her constant desire to worship and obey her designated times for obedience. Lord Almighty. While the woman who sees in her dream that she is wearing a short green dress, what she saw shows that she is a reckless person who performs many reckless and useless actions. Interpretation of a dream about a green dress for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees herself wearing a green dress that covers all parts of Her body and nothing is visible from her, this indicates that she is a disabled person and is balanced in all the actions that she does to please God Almighty. While the girl who dreams that she is walking around in a loose green dress with happiness, this vision indicates her asceticism in worldly life and her complete focus on worship and not Having no desire to learn about any of life's temptations. Or pleasures. Whereas if a girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a green dress and meets a stranger with her, this means that she will fall in love with a special person who appreciates her, respects her way of thinking, and will have the blessing of a husband. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a green dress for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about knitting woolSpinningWords of spinning in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a woolen hookInterpretation of a dream about someone flirting with meFlirting in a dreamFlirting in a dreamWorking wool in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about someone flirting with meIf a woman dreams that she is spinning and rushing to spin, then she comes to absence, and if she relaxes in spinning, or travels, or her husband travels, and if she is spinning Cotton, then she leaves her dowry to her husband, and if she steals flax, then she seeks wisdom. If the spinning is fine, then it is work in which he is tired, and if it is heavy, then it is a journey in which he will be victorious. And whoever sees that he is spinning wool or hair and the like, then he will travel and do good. If a woman sees that she is spinning cotton She is cheating on her husband. If a man dreams that he is spinning cotton and flax, and imitating women, then he will suffer humiliation, and perform the legitimate work. If the pressure is accurate, it works with little. And if she is fat, then it is a journey of hardship and fatigue. Whoever dreams that he is twisting hair is traveling on a journey that is not praiseworthy for him. Whoever sees that he is spinning wool will waste his money. Whoever sees that he is spinning linen or cotton or something similar to what a woman spins, then she suffers from humiliation and humiliation, and she performs the legitimate work while her hands are not sufficient for it. And whoever sees that he has lost a thread, then his faith and covenants are invalidated, according to the Almighty’s words, and do not be like the one who lost his thread after breaking the strength of the verse, and perhaps it is attributed to the mother. Women. In the event of childbirth or ongoing injury. If a woman sees that she is spinning and hastening to spin, then she is absent from it. If she sees that it slows down the speed of rotation, then she will travel and her husband will travel. Broken washing machine shaft. title: Interpretation of seeing a tank in a dream, driving it, and escaping from it

preview.html: Did you see a tank in your dream and feel fear and dread? Does the interpretation of seeing a tank in a dream symbolize good or evil? What is the meaning of seeing a vehicle, a plane, and an explosion in a dream? All of these questions we will learn about their interpretation in detail according to the interpretation of leading scholars. Interpretation of seeing a tank in a dream. Seeing a tank in a dream symbolizes powerful enemies, but also symbolizes power. So whoever sees in a dream that he is inside a tank, this means immunity and protection from enemies. As for whoever sees himself sitting on top of a tank, the vision here symbolizes strength and the ability to confront the enemy and defeat him. Whoever sees himself sleeping in the tank, the dream indicates failure to perform his duties, and whoever sees only the tank’s cannon, this indicates the accusations directed at the dreamer, It is an indication of a person who brings hostility to the pioneer. Scenes: If one sees flamethrowers being fired from a tank, this means that he hears insulting and slanderous words, and firing missiles indicates the emergence of strife and strife, and it symbolizes the lack of stability and security between parents. Seeing a tank in a single woman’s dreamIf an unmarried girl sees a tank in her dream, This indicates her increased determination to achieve what she wants. However, if she sees her father driving a military tank, the dream indicates that she will be protected from harm, and God knows best. But if she sees herself being exposed to death from tank shelling, this indicates the harm she will be exposed to. However, if she sees herself being saved from war and tank shelling, then the vision symbolizes... Rescue from their tongues. Those around her, and if she sees herself afraid of a tank exploding, this indicates her fear of some calamities, and if she sees herself running away from a tank in a dream, this is a sign that she is running away from the cunning of others. A tank in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a tank in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the difficulties and problems she is going through, and the vision here is praiseworthy and indicates the end of worry and anxiety. If she fears tank war, this indicates her weakness and inability to endure. A tank in a dream for a married woman. If a woman sees If a married woman sees a tank in her dream, this indicates her continuous effort to get rid of her marital problems. The tank showed that her life has changed for the worse, and God knows best. But if she dreams that she is driving a tank, this means that she will bear great responsibilities, and if she sees her son driving a tank, the dream shows his difficulty and responsibility, but if he is afraid of hearing the sound of the tank and the vision expresses her anxiety and instability, and if she runs away from the tanks The vision indicates his distance from competitors and enemies, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was driving a tank. Whoever dreams that he is driving a tank, the dream indicates his ability to control himself and stay away from all desires. People. Whoever sees himself learning to drive a tank, this indicates his constant search for power, but if you see that you are teaching another person to drive a tank, the dream indicates that this person will gain power. Interpretation of a dream about war with airplanes: Whoever sees in his dream a war with airplanes, The dream indicates intense competition at work to obtain a living, and

title: Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea for a married and pregnant woman

preview.html: Seeing yourself swimming in the sea in a dream has many interpretations, and we need to know the social status of the pioneer, his psychological state, the state of the sea in which he saw himself swimming, whether it was calm or rough, and the time of swimming in the morning or evening, which we will explain in detail in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea for a married woman when A married woman dreams that she is swimming in the sea, then this indicates the close relationship between her and her husband. It may indicate family stability for her. If she sees herself cursing in a sea of ​​pure and clear water, this indicates her husband’s love for her and his devotion to her. But if the sea water is impure and full of dirt Garbage indicates the husband’s hatred and betrayal of his wife. Cloudy sea water in a dream. Married / married means that she is fighting and has problems between her and her husband. But if she sees herself swimming to the beach, this indicates success in life and children. Whoever sees that she is swimming with the children in the sea and she is calm, then this A good indicator of pregnancy. A dream about drowning in the sea is a sign of her husband’s psychological and financial crisis. If you see drowning about justice and escaping death, it indicates the emergence of insight from the problems that she was suffering from. The meaning of a dream about swimming in the sea for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who sees that she is swimming in a calm sea Clear water indicates ease of childbirth, God willing. But if swimming in turbid and dirty water mentions difficulty in childbirth. This may mean that you are suffering from health problems during the months of pregnancy. The meaning of swimming in the sea for single people. Swimming in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes his emotional and personal life. Who is dreaming? To swim with her lover in a dream, and the water is clear, means the lover’s proposal to the fortuneteller. If the water is unclear, it means separation. When a girl dreams that she is bathing in the sea with a person unknown to her, this is a sign that someone is thinking about getting engaged to her. As for the fiancée who She dreams that she is swimming in the sea with blue water, this indicates that she has finished her devices and is ready to consummate marriage. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, indicating the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing the sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: If you dream of seeing the sea in a dream, then seeing the sea is a sign of abundance of goodness, livelihood and other things. It is also a sign of the fulfillment of desires and dreams. The sea in a dream has many meanings because it differs between good and evil, and the interpretation differs between a man and a woman. The sea indicates goodness, abundance of money, knowledge, satisfaction of desires, and marriage for a boy. As for the girl. And ease of childbirth for the pregnant woman.. The sea indicates knowledge, jurisprudence, wisdom, logic, and the destruction of a fruitful trade or a prestigious job. Interpretation of the sea view by Ibn Sirin: A dream of the sea indicates the fear, problems, and dangers that the dreamer feels. Whoever sees the sea in a dream and works in reality as a merchant, the dreamer will reap A lot of money and profits. Dreaming of seeing the sea in a dream indicates that the sea shows sadness and strife among people. Whoever thinks that he is going down to the sea in a dream and getting dirty with mud will face many problems. Seeing the sea and salty water, indicates the presence of an unfaithful man. The raging sea appears in a dream The problems that the dreamer finds himself in. The raging sea in a dream indicates anger. Interpretation of seeing the sea according to Al-Nabulsi: If the dreamer sees that he is bathing in sea water, he will get rid of all problems. Seeing the sea in a dream To see yourself drinking from the sea indicates a source of livelihood and abundance. Of money. A single man who sees in his dream that he is drowning in the sea is evidence of the difficulties he is going through to achieve his goals. Seeing a calm sea in a dream means calm and peace that will remain in the dreamer’s life. A clear sea in a dream indicates a person’s recovery from a disease that afflicted him. Interpretation of the view of the sea for a pregnant woman: The sea in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of goodness and grace. The sea in a dream indicates that the pregnant woman will give birth to the child she wants, a boy or a girl. Seeing the sea in a dream Seeing a pregnant woman floating in the sea is evidence of an easy birth. Seeing the sea in a dream A pregnant woman bathing in sea water means that she will not feel the pain of childbirth. A pregnant woman drinking sea water in a dream portends salvation from all the problems that befall her. Interpretation of seeing the sea for a single woman: Seeing the sea in a dream The sea in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of kindness and blessings. For unmarried women to dream that they are diving in the sea means that they will get rid of their problems. The sea in one dream is a sign of a good future for the girl. Interpretation of the sea view for a married woman: The sea in a married woman’s dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams. But a married woman washing in a dream with sea water It indicates her liberation from her sins. Dreaming of seeing the sea in a dream indicates that the sea in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will get rid of the problems that arise between her and her husband. The sea in a dream for a married woman without children means the approaching pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about the blue sea for a married woman. The blue sea appears in a dream many Of benefits and many good things. It may also indicate tension in the relationship with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about the blue sea for a married woman. Seeing the sea in a dream. Seeing a calm sea indicates the stability of marital life. It is also announced by her offspring.

Dreaming of seeing the sea in a dream indicates that the sea shows sadness and strife among people. Whoever thinks that he is going down to the sea in a dream and getting dirty with mud will face many problems. Seeing the sea and salty water, indicates the presence of an unfaithful man. The raging sea appears in a dream The problems that the dreamer finds himself in. The raging sea in a dream indicates anger. Interpretation of seeing the sea according to Al-Nabulsi: If the dreamer sees that he is bathing in sea water, he will get rid of all problems. Seeing the sea in a dream To see yourself drinking from the sea indicates a source of livelihood and abundance. Of money. A single man who sees in his dream that he is drowning in the sea is evidence of the difficulties he is going through to achieve his goals. Seeing a calm sea in a dream means calm and peace that will remain in the dreamer’s life. A clear sea in a dream indicates a person’s recovery from a disease that afflicted him. Interpretation of the view of the sea for a pregnant woman: The sea in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of goodness and grace. The sea in a dream indicates that the pregnant woman will give birth to the child she wants, a boy or a girl. Seeing the sea in a dream Seeing a pregnant woman floating in the sea is evidence of an easy birth. Seeing the sea in a dream A pregnant woman bathing in sea water means that she will not feel the pain of childbirth. A pregnant woman drinking sea water in a dream portends salvation from all the problems that befall her. Interpretation of seeing the sea for a single woman: Seeing the sea in a dream The sea in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of kindness and blessings. For unmarried women to dream that they are diving in the sea means that they will get rid of their problems. The sea in one dream is a sign of a good future for the girl. Interpretation of the sea view for a married woman: The sea in a married woman’s dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams. But a married woman washing in a dream with sea water It indicates her liberation from her sins. Dreaming of seeing the sea in a dream indicates that the sea in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will get rid of the problems that arise between her and her husband. The sea in a dream for a married woman without children means the approaching pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about the blue sea for a married woman. The blue sea appears in a dream many Of benefits and many good things. It may also indicate tension in the relationship with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about the blue sea for a married woman. Seeing the sea in a dream. Seeing a calm sea indicates the stability of marital life. It is also announced by her offspring.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a full chair in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women?

Much has been completed in the dream and is a symbol of the presence of a chair in a complete dream, as we have collected for you the correct and correct interpretation from adult interpretation and vision books about seeing a plastic chair in a complete dream for married and pregnant women, as well as for men. You should follow the article if you are interested in knowing the explanation. What is the interpretation of a chair by Ibn Sirin? A chair in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, is a sign of the dreamer’s high status. It is also considered a symbol of luxury if the chair is beautiful and different. Sitting on a white chair in a dream completely indicates The end of problems and worries and the enjoyment of a stable life. The merchant sitting on a chair in his dream indicates that he will achieve a large profit in his trade. Iron chairs in a complete dream are one of the visions that indicate a good future for the dreamer in his life. Luxurious chairs in the dreamer’s dream indicate that he will reap a living. Good and abundant. Interpretation of seeing a chair in a completed dream for a common woman. Seeing a chair in a person’s dream indicates a life full of success and fulfillment of desires. Seeing her studying on a chair in her dream means success and success in her studies. Looking at a chair with many chairs around it shows that there are many admirers of it. Sitting on a desirable chair is a sign of marrying the person he wants. Seeing a complete plastic chair in a dream for an ordinary woman means happiness and hearing good news. But sitting on a wooden chair can be a sign of many problems in her life. Iron chairs in her dream indicate To plenty of sustenance and abundance of goodness. If a woman is sitting on a luxurious chair in her dream, this indicates her husband’s intense love for her. Sitting on a chair indicates Broken in a dream indicates some problems in her life. Seeing an iron chair in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her high status at work. What is the interpretation of seeing a wheelchair for a married woman? It indicates loneliness in her life and her husband’s neglect of her. What is the interpretation of seeing a chair for a pregnant woman? A wooden chair indicates In a pregnant woman’s dream, there is a peaceful life and an end to worries and problems. A chair without a back is evidence that she has given birth to a baby girl. Interpretation of seeing many chairs in a dream It is complete evidence that the dreamer will collect some money from his trade. It is also a symbol of glaucoma, and sitting on chairs is considered success, prosperity, and reaping benefits. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about my brother-in-law looking at me according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a brother-in-law watching me is among the dreams that cause fear and anxiety in women, and interpreters differed in interpreting this vision. Interpretation of a dream about a brother-in-law watching me. Some interpreters and scholars have confirmed that seeing a married woman whose husband’s brother is looking at her indicates that this woman is moving away from her worship and following her personal instincts and whims. Also, this vision shows that the woman is not honest and insecure about her private life with her husband and does not care about her husband. Scientists said that this vision could be satanic themes because Satan is such a person because of a dispute between spouses and they have isolated each other. If a married woman dreams that Her husband’s sister looks at her, this indicates that her husband’s brother admires her and that he considers her a beautiful person and wants to have a wife like her. Interpretation of a dream about my brother-in-law by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says when a married woman dreams that her sister’s husband is arguing with her, this is a sign of the woman’s deviation from God and the straight path, and this vision is A warning from God to approach Him and perform acts of worship. And good deeds. The dream also indicates that the married woman commits sins, neglects religious life, and her sins multiply. This vision may be a representation of the devil and his appearance in the form of her husband’s brother. When a married woman dreams of her husband’s brother in a normal state, this means that the person will go through crises in the coming period and get rid of them quickly, and this vision also shows that the married woman is preoccupied with his brother’s conditions for her. The husband and thinking about him. Interpretation of a dream about Asrar is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just write: A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about my brother-in-law for married people. When a married woman dreams of a woman who is being discussed by her sister’s husband, this indicates that the woman will help her sister’s husband in a solution. His problems, support and support until he overcomes his problems. This help may be nothing more than advice, guidance and wise decisions, but if a married woman dreams that her husband’s brother is giving her advice and guidance, this indicates the woman’s inability to make the right decisions in her life. If a married woman She dreams that she sees her sister’s husband talking to her without shame, then this indicates family bonding and the existence of mutual respect and appreciation between individuals. However, if the vision is accompanied by actions that violate the law, then this is considered an unpleasant dream, which indicates that the woman has committed many sins that anger God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about my husband’s brother for a pregnant woman: This pregnant woman’s dream is considered a praiseworthy dream. If a pregnant woman dreams of her husband’s brother looking at her and her husband is absent and not with her, this indicates the husband’s brother’s interest in his brother’s wife and his preservation of her health and the newborn. It also indicates that the husband’s brother is providing assistance to his brother’s wife during her pregnancy. It also indicates that the time of birth is approaching and the pregnant woman must get rid of her fear and anxiety. Some scholars believe that this vision indicates that the pregnant woman will give birth to a boy who resembles her uncle. The vision also indicates that the pregnant woman will rest. From the fatigue and pain that Athen suffered from

title: Learn about the most important interpretations of seeing bracelets in a dream

preview.html: Bracelets in a dreamOne of the things that drives many people to search is to know what it indicates, as gold in general is an interesting metal, so how if it is in the form of bracelets or if these bracelets are made of silver, and through our research into many things, we found that scholars have many opinions about seeing gold bracelets in a dream, which we will show you below. Bracelets in a dreamBracelets have always been one of the most important types of jewelry that we have used in our lives throughout the ages for both sexes, as they were not limited to women only, but extended to men to adorn themselves in battles. While a woman who sees bracelets in her dream shows that she will bear many obligations and responsibilities in her life. Bracelets in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin interprets the vision of bracelets in a woman's dream with several distinctive signs, which are as follows: If the dreamer sees bracelets made of silver, this means that he follows many orders and affairs that cause her sadness and boredom. While bracelets, especially silver ones, in a man's dream indicate the large share of the inheritance left to him, he will spend it in doing good and good for the sake of God (Almighty), which ensures his satisfaction and satisfaction. Success in his endeavors forever. Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type a site about Secrets of Dream Interpretation Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Bracelets in a dream Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi confirmed that bracelets in a girl's dream symbolize enjoying the luxury of life and the availability of many advantages and blessings in her life, which provides her with a good opportunity to live in bliss and comfort that allows her to work on designing her future as she wants. While he mentioned that seeing a man wearing many gold bracelets in his dream is one of the visions that cannot be interpreted at all for him, as it indicates that he has gone through many problems and obstacles in his life, which will not be easy to get rid of at all. Bracelets in a dream for a single woman The appearance of bracelets in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the things that portends her marriage to a good and beloved person who has many advantages that make him suitable for her, apart from his great ability to love her and do everything. In his power to make her happy. While the girl who sees in her dream very shiny bracelets that cause severe pain in her hands and eyes, this vision indicates that she will face many problems in her life due to the presence of a spoiled young man in her life who wants to do her more harm than good, so she should try to stay away from him as much as possible. Gold bracelets in a single woman's dream An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is wearing gold bracelets, this vision symbolizes that she will enjoy in the coming days a new and different life from the one she has lived throughout her life, which will lead her either to enter a new life. title: What is the interpretation of buying new shoes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Buying new shoes in a dream is a benign scene that does not occur often, but it includes several indicators that vary depending on the condition and color of the shoes. In this article, we will learn about the most important interpretations of seeing shoes in a dream. Buying new shoes in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is buying new shoes from a shoe store, but finds them broken, indicates the dreamer’s marriage, but his joy will not be complete, and the marriage will be miserable. When the dreamer buys Shoes of a smaller color, this indicates suffering and illness, whether for the dreamer or for his wife. If the dreamer sees that he is buying a series of unused shoes, this symbolizes the dreamer’s attempt to improve his social and economic situation. A dream about buying new shoes interprets the positive changes that will occur as a result of the transition to life. In which you will find everything you want and it also indicates happy news and a bright future that awaits the dreamer. Ibn Shaheen sees the interpretation of buying new shoes in a dream as a sign of joy and the dreamer’s attempt to overcome all the difficulties he faces in his life and work to solve them. Buying new shoes in a dream by Ibn Siriniri Ibn Sirin, in the interpretation of a dream, buying shoes is a sign of rising and reaching a great position that the dreamer aspired to reach, such as a promotion at work. The vision of buying new shoes is considered a good vision that always heralds goodness and good living, unlike selling shoes, so it is one of the harmless visions that portends evil. If the shoes are black, this indicates travel, a halal living, and earning large sums of money. If the color of the shoes is green, this indicates the religious duties in which the dreamer travels to visit religious shrines and learn about them. While if they are red, it shows a trip to luxury, pleasure, and improving the condition. Psychological. Buying new shoes in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is buying new shoes, symbolizes the happiness and pleasure that she will get when she marries a good man who knows God and treats her well. Seeing new shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the end of difficulties and the arrival of Ease and the disappearance of the worries that plagued her life. If the shoe is of an unacceptable shape and dirty, this indicates fraud and fraud by a greedy person. As for seeing the entire shoe store in an unmarried woman’s dream, this indicates the appropriate time for marriage and that her current age is The best age for marriage and may God bless her with a good man. Buying tight shoes in a dream for a girl indicates haste and an inability to think about the right decisions and always choose the wrong decisions. Interpretation of a dream about buying new black shoes for single women: For an unmarried woman to see in her dream that she is buying new black shoes It means happiness because someone wants to marry her and she is characterized by a good reputation, good morals, and good treatment. If the shoe is black and needs polishing, this means joy, happiness, halal food, and an abundance of goodness, in addition to the fact that the girl must be in good health and able to act and balance things before judging the situation.
